main event: A witness observed a bright, stationary object in the night sky in Fairborn, Dayton, Ohio on May 27, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as having a bright greyish-white color,It appeared larger than a star and had no sound emitted from it,The witness estimated the speed of the object to be very fast, around 5000 mph,The object was seen from an airfield and lasted in sight for approximately 45 minutes,The object gradually faded out and disappeared after a few minutes.
sighted object: a bright stationary object resembling a star
witness description: A 25-year-old female who reported no special experience.
